name: Riya Sharma
bio: Riya is a Bollywood singer known for her soulful performances at weddings and private events.

name: Amit Verma
bio: Amit specializes in contemporary and hip-hop styles, bringing energy to every stage he performs on.

name: DJ Sonic
bio: Popular EDM and techno DJ, featured in multiple national music festivals including Sunburn.

name: Neha Kulkarni
bio: Motivational speaker and author, Neha inspires audiences with her stories of leadership and growth.
